idea:
Even the best human investors are invariably prone to react to market euphoria and panic that lead to irrational and emotional investing.


At Upside AI, we leverage machine learning tools while staying true to fundamental investing principles. We are trying to bridge the gap between active investing and eliminating bias / emotions from the process to find consistent alpha over conventional investing. 


Our mission is to bring the most sophisticated investing technology to Indian investors and maximize their upside.
